casebody.data:
Kevin WARD, Appellant,
v.
MISSOURI DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent. WD 81402 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: April 30, 2019 Kevin Ward, Jefferson City, MO, Appellant, pro se. Eric S. Schmitt, Attorney General, and Andrew J. Crane, Assistant Attorney General, Jefferson City, MO, Attorneys for Respondent. Before Division Four: Karen King Mitchell, Chief Judge, and Alok Ahuja and Cynthia L. Martin, Judges Order Per Curiam:

Kevin Ward appeals the grant of the Missouri Board of Probation and Parole's motion for judgment on the pleadings in his declaratory judgment action. Ward argues that the trial court misapplied the law in entering judgment in the Board's favor. Finding no error, we affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
